question: good ance cleansers???
question_content: im 12 and i am starting to get acne like in between my eyes and alond my hair line.....i cant get it to go away! i need help! my only other choice is trying to use makeup to conver it up...what should i do??

answers.answer_content: Don't use makeup to cover it up. It just makes them worse. Keep your hair super clean. Like, wash it twice a day if you have to. Wash your face every time you shower. Use a good astringent and keep your face grease free. :)
